      • getPhotosByTag

        java.util.ArrayList<Photo> getPhotosByTag(java.lang.String[] tags,
                                        java.lang.String search)
        To retrieve all photos that have all the given tags, in chronological order. Tags can be specified with or without their types
        Parameters:
        tags - String[] of tags in format - :"tagValue"
        search - the search string
        Returns:
